mapper.select: SELECT OCH_CODE, OCH_NO, CONVERT(char(10), ORD_DATE, 23) as ORD_DATE, CONVERT(char(10), OCH_DATE, 23) as OCH_DATE, OCH_SU, ROUND(OCH_AMNT,1) AS OCH_AMNT, OCH_NAME, OCH_BIGO, OCH_PRN, OCH_MON, OCH_LOT, ORDERT.ORD_CODE, PROD_GUBN, PROD_NAME, PROD_NO, PROD_JAI, PROD_GYU, PROD_DANW, OCH_DANG, PROD_DANJ, CORP_NAME, TECH_TE, OCH_MA, CORP_GYUL2 FROM OCHULGO INNER JOIN ORDERT ON ORDERT.ORD_CODE = OCHULGO.ORD_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON PRODUCT.PROD_CODE = ORDERT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON CORP.CORP_CODE = PRODUCT.CORP_CODE INNER JOIN TECHIN ON TECHIN.TECH_NO = PRODUCT.TECH_NO WHERE OCH_DATE BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}

SELECT ORDERT.ORD_CODE, ORD_DATE,PRODUCT.PROD_CODE, IsNULL( ORD_CHULHACHECK, 0 ) as ORD_CHULHACHECK, ORD_SU, ORD_AMNT, ORD_NAME, ORD_BIGO, ORD_LOT, PROD_GUBN, PROD_NAME, PROD_NO, PROD_JAI, PROD_GYU, ORD_DANW, ORD_DANG, ORD_DANJ, CORP_NAME,TECH_TE, CASE WHEN ORD_DANW = 'KG' THEN ORD_AMNT - (ISNULL(OCH_AMNT_SUM,0)+ORD_DANJ) ELSE ( ORD_SU - ISNULL(OCH_SU_SUM,0) ) END as JAIGO, ORD_SU - ISNULL(OCH_SU_SUM,0) AS JAIGO_SU, ORD_AMNT - (ISNULL(OCH_AMNT_SUM,0)+ORD_DANJ) AS JAIGO_AMNT, ORD_AMNT - (ISNULL(OCH_AMNT_SUM,0)+ORD_DANJ) AS ochAmnt, CASE WHEN ORD_DANW = 'KG' THEN ORD_AMNT ELSE ORD_SU END as ORDSU, CASE WHEN ORD_DANW = 'KG' THEN ISNULL(OCH_AMNT_SUM,0) ELSE ISNULL(OCH_SU_SUM,0) END as OCHSU, CASE WHEN ORD_DANW = 'KG' THEN ORD_DANG * ( ORD_AMNT - (ISNULL(OCH_AMNT_SUM,0)+ORD_DANJ) ) ELSE ORD_DANG * ( ORD_SU - ISNULL(OCH_SU_SUM,0) ) END as ochMon, OCHULGO_SUM.* FROM ORDERT INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON PRODUCT.PROD_CODE = ORDERT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON CORP.CORP_CODE = PRODUCT.CORP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(OCHULGO.ORD_CODE) AS ORD_CODE_SUM, COUNT (OCHULGO.ORD_CODE) AS COUNT_SUM, SUM(OCH_SU) AS OCH_SU_SUM, SUM(OCH_AMNT) AS OCH_AMNT_SUM, SUM(OCH_SPECIMEN) AS OCH_SPECIMEN_SUM FROM OCHULGO INNER JOIN ORDERT ON ORDERT.ORD_CODE = OCHULGO.ORD_CODE WHERE ORD_DATE BETWEEN #{sdate} and #{edate} GROUP BY OCHULGO.ORD_CODE ) OCHULGO_SUM ON OCHULGO_SUM.ORD_CODE_SUM = ORDERT.ORD_CODE WHERE ORD_DATE BETWEEN #{sdate} and #{edate} AND IsNULL( ORD_CHULHACHECK, 0 ) != '1' AND 0 < ORD_SU - ISNULL(OCH_SU_SUM,0)
